enchantment.gravitation.hercules_strengt: Deal more damage to Aether Bosses(Sun Spirit not included).
enchantment.gravitation.neptune_wrath.de: Deal more damage to water mobs.
gravitation.tooltip.can_create_enchantin: Right click on a Enchanted Gravitite Block to create an Enchanting Table.
lore.block.gravitation.enchanted_log: These spawn on Enchanted Tree. They can double dropped with Skyroot Axes. When put in the crafting table they will provide 4 Enchanted Planks
lore.block.gravitation.enchanted_sapling: These blue saplings will grow into Enchanted Trees. They can be grown faster with Bone Meal.
lore.item.gravitation.bronzite_axe: This Axe was crafted in the fire of the Sun Spirit. It last longer most of the time.
lore.item.gravitation.bronzite_battleaxe: This Battleaxe was crafted in the fire of the Sun Spirit. It last longer most of the time.
lore.item.gravitation.bronzite_boots: Those Boots were crafted in the fire of the Sun Spirit. It last longer most of the time.
lore.item.gravitation.bronzite_chestplat: This Chestplate was crafted in the fire of the Sun Spirit. It last longer most of the time.
lore.item.gravitation.bronzite_gloves: Those Gloves were crafted in the fire of the Sun Spirit. It last longer most of the time.
lore.item.gravitation.bronzite_helmet: This Helmet was crafted in the fire of the Sun Spirit. It last longer most of the time.
lore.item.gravitation.bronzite_hoe: This Hoe was crafted in the fire of the Sun Spirit. It last longer most of the time.
lore.item.gravitation.bronzite_leggings: Those Leggings were crafted in the fire of the Sun Spirit. It last longer most of the time.
lore.item.gravitation.bronzite_pendent: This Pendent was crafted in the fire of the Sun Spirit. Grant +2 Armor Toughness when worn.
lore.item.gravitation.bronzite_pickaxe: This Pickaxe was crafted in the fire of the Sun Spirit. It last longer most of the time.
lore.item.gravitation.bronzite_ring: This Ring was crafted in the fire of the Sun Spirit. Grant +2 Armor when worn.
lore.item.gravitation.bronzite_shovel: This Shovel was crafted in the fire of the Sun Spirit. It last longer most of the time.
lore.item.gravitation.bronzite_sword: This Sword was crafted in the fire of the Sun Spirit. It last longer most of the time.
lore.item.gravitation.neptune_battleaxe: Found in Silver Dungeon, The Neptune Battleaxe is a slower axe with sweeping.
lore.item.gravitation.neptune_cutlass: Found in Silver Dungeon, The Neptune Cutlass is a single target weapon with high attack speed.
lore.item.gravitation.neptune_pendant: Found in Silver Dungeon, The Neptune Pendant grant the user +1.5 Swim Speed.
lore.item.gravitation.neptune_ring: Found in Silver Dungeon, The Neptune Ring grant the user +1.5 Swim Speed.
lore.item.gravitation.phoenix_dart: These Phoenix Darts are found in Gold Dungeon. Set the target on fire on hit.
lore.item.gravitation.phoenix_dart_shoot: The Phoenix Dart Shooter is found in Gold Dungeon. It can shoot Phoenix Darts
lore.item.gravitation.valkyrie_battleaxe: Found in Silver Dungeon, The Valkyrie Battleaxe is a slower Valkyrie axe with sweeping.
